thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Pamela Murphy

author: Pamela Murphy
title: Pamela Murphy
text:
I have been very impressed with the service that Servcorp have given me both in Adelaide and when arranging an office at Southbank, Melbourne.
Samantha Watsford, Adelaide has been particularly pleasant and helpful. She is able to fulfil her duties in a very professional manner while being cheery and pleasant. She is 'present' for all our conversations and I enjoy speaking with her. Samantha makes me feel like she is there to serve and help me and not to display her self-importance or position in the organisation.
I'm also very satisfied with the way Erin answers calls and conveys messages. This provides a sense of confidence when I'm away and not able to attend to calls, knowing that the calls will be answered in a professional and friendly manner with the opportunity to respond to clients in a timely manner.
